name: Settlement Rebates
description: amount of rebate revenue recognized as part of the given delivery of projects or services (such as product installation â€” not a ""ship and bill"" transaction for a physical product, per Rockwell Automation revenue recognition rules), stored as a decimal in the currency specified by the COPA Record Currency Code
Settlement Rebates = Settlement Rebate Claims - Settlement Rebate Promotion Incentives
